resources: BookListing Enter the category of book Search Search Intent "When the ListView is empty YOu can start creating items by using the setEmptyView method of ArrayAdapter class. For instance consider you have a Listview by the id of @android:id/list and you have a TextView with the id "@android:id/empty THe following should be the lines of code in corresponding java file final ArrayAdapter adapter = new ArrayAdapter(this, Object_of_Generic_type); ListView l= (ListView) findViewbyId(android.R.id.list); l.setEmptyView(findViewById(android.R.id.empty)); l.setAdapter(adapter);" > Book https://www.googleapis.com/books/v1/volumes?q= "maxResults=10">
